item.title: Getting started with sinatra
item.description: Your first Sinatra app # # app.rb require 'sinatra' get '/' do 'Hello, Universe!' end Install Sinatra: gem install sinatra Run the app: ruby app.rb That’s it! Access your app at http://localhost:4567 Installation # You can install Sinatra as a global gem: gem install sinatra or add it to a project’s Gemfile # in Gemfile: gem 'sinatra' and run bundle install.

item.title: Routing
item.description: What is routing # In Sinatra, routing is how your app responds to requests, by the path of the request (e.g. /welcome) and by the HTTP verb used (e.g. GET or POST).
